UnclosedStringLiteral: String literal is not closed on the same line
UnclosedCharLiteral: Character literal is not closed on the same line
HexLiteralWithMixedCase: Hexadecimal literals can not have letters a-f that are sometimes uppercase and sometimes lowercase
EscapeSequenceError: There is an error with one of the escape sequences in this string literal
ExpectedSemicolon: This statement has to be ended by a semicolon ';'
UnexpectedExpressionTerm: This token is not legal at this part of an expression
ExpectedCommaOrClosingParenthesis: A comma ',' for the next parameter or a closing parenthesis ')' to close the function call was expected
ExpectedEqualsOrSemicolon: An equals '=' to specify this variable's initial value or a semicolon ';' to end the variable declaration was expected
OnlyFunctionCallExpressionCanBeStatement: This kind of expression is not a legal statement
ExpectedAsOrEquals: Expected the keyword 'As' to specify the type or an equals '=' to specify the initial value
NewVariableInForWithoutDefaultValue: A variable declared in a For statement has to have an initial value
ForConditionHasToBeTrueOrComparisonWithI: The condition after 'While' in a For loop has to be either the 'True' or a comparison with the iteration variable as its left operand
ForWithPartHasToAssignIterationVariable: The 'With' part of a For loop has to assign the iteration variable
ForNeitherWhileNorWith: The For statement neither has a 'While' nor a 'With' part while it has to have one or both of them
LetVariableAndConstMustBeInitialized: A variable declared with 'Let' and a constant must be immediately initialized
ConstantValueMustBeLiteralOrComplex: A constant must be initialized by a literal or a complex value in the form a + bi, e.g. '3 + 4i'
CantAssignUndeclaredVariable: This variable is not declared (at least not in scope)
CantRedeclareVariable: A variable with the same name is already declared in scope
ForNotVariable: The identifier does not refer to a local variable
CantFindIdentifierInScope: In this scope, this identifier is not declared
CantReAssignReadOnlyVariable: The variable can't be assigned again because it is read only
LoopControlStatementNotThatDeep: There are not that many nested loops
PropertyDoesNotExistInType: This type does not have this property
DuplicateParameter: There aready exists a parameter with this name
CantRedeclareGlobalSymbol: A function or constant with this name already exists
BinaryOperatorNotValidOnType: This binary operator cannot be used on these two types
UnaryOperatorNotValidOnType: This unary operator cannot be used on this type
OnlyFunctionWithReturnTypeCanBeExpressio: A function with no return type cannot be used as an expression
WrongNumberOfArguments: This function cannot be called with this number of arguments
CantConvertType: The source type cannot be converted to the target type
FunctionNotValidInContext: A function is not valid in the current context
ForIterationVariableHasToBeNumberType: The iteration variable of a For statement has to be one of the following types: Int, Rational, Complex
ReturnedValueEvenThoughFunctionDoesNotHa: A value is returned from the function even though it does not have a return type
ReturnedNoValueEvenThoughFunctionShouldR: The function is declared to return a value but this Return statement doesn't return a value
ConstTypeHasToMatchLiteralTypeExactly: The type of the constant has to be exactly the type of the literal that is assigned to it
OperatorNotAvailableForTypes: This operator cannot be applied to two operands of those type
